document: THE EFFECTS OF PROVISIONS FOR IMAGERY THROUGH MATERIALS AND DRAWINGS ON TRANSLATING ALGEBRA WORD PROBLEMS, GRADES SEVEN ANO NINE BY PAUL JOSEPH SHOECRAFT A DISSERTATION SUBMITTED IN PARTIAL FULFILLMENT OF THE REQUIREMENTS FOR THE DEGREE OF Doctor of PHILOSOPHY (EDUCATION) IN THE UNIVERSITY OF MICHIGAN 1971 DOCTORAL COMMITTEE: PROFESSOR JOSEPH N.
